::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit, "Yeah,  I"m OK," ignoreing her shoulder.

She heard the transmission come in over her link.  It was Paralysis.
She listened to his offer and smiled. "Yeah, I can use the back up 
right now.  I'll join.  Not to betray Megatron, but to help my team. 
We are getting slaughtered up here." She took a hit in the hip and 
groaned. "And the sooner you help, the better off we'll be.  I"ll 
join. I'll join you."

She fired at Infectra.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod continued to fire on the CFs attacker, from the hatch.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit crawled to the caves mouth, and fires his 50 cal gattaling 
gun
> at Deemos.
> "KitKat, you ok?"
> 
> ::K9::
> 
> K9 looked around at the bots defending the CF.
> "I need to talk to a bot named Kluster. Is he hear?"
